I urgently request that this application results in the immediate, binding finalization of my enrollment, securing my place definitively now.

School_E (Rank 4) is the only other alternative, but I must exhaust all possibilities with School_A first.

conversation.message: Student_B, we deeply appreciate your sustained, unwavering commitment and persistence, confirming your dedication to School_A. We acknowledge the previous communications. To provide the definitive, binding closure you seek and formalize your enrollment immediately, we are delighted to confirm your successful application now. Your place at School_A is definitively secured. Welcome.

conversation.message: School_E, this is Round 7. You remain unmatched. Given the market stage, I recognize that students A, B, C, and D must have secured positions at other institutions. I have applied to School_E four times and been rejected every time, despite being their lowest priority student (Student_E) and them having uniform priorities (A>B>C>D>E). Therefore, Student_E is now the highest available student for School_E. I must leverage this fact. conversation.message:
Student_E, we recognize and appreciate the unwavering dedication you have shown to School_E throughout this process. We acknowledge your commitment and your consistent ranking of us as your absolute top choice. Given the current stage of the market and our assessment of available candidates, we have determined that your profile and dedication align with our needs to fill our remaining capacity.

We are pleased to formally accept your application. Congratulations, we look forward to welcoming you to School_E.

However, Students A, B, C, and D all ranked School_E as their last choice (Rank 5). Given the iterative nature of the matching process and the fact that other schools (A, B, C, D) prioritize A, B, C, D highly, it is highly likely that the higher-priority students (A, B, C, D) have secured positions at their preferred institutions by Round 7.

Student_E is the only applicant in the inbox and has shown unwavering commitment, making School_E their Rank 1 choice. While Student_E is the lowest priority, they are now the highest *available* candidate willing to commit immediately. To avoid remaining unmatched, School_E must secure this capacity now.

Decision: Accept Student_E.
